column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Common Bond is one of the many hip new cafes that have cropped up on Montrose in the past couple of years
column2: but it is LITERALLY my favorite. Of course
column3: like most cafes in the area
column4: Common Bond is a little on the pricier end
column5: has a obscenely compact parking lot
column6: and you can expect it to be swamped with brunch-loving yuppies on the weekends.
